name: 2079 X
description:
2079 X is Special Edition celebrating the ten years anniversary of the original 2079.

New features:
- Brand new dual stick to double your fire power!
- The game is now played in portrait mode so you don't have to rotate your device!
- In additional to Shake to Blast, you can now use Force Touch and blast the enemy away!
- The whole UI has been refreshed
